about_the_game:
You are dead...
So, yeah, sorry to tell you this, but you are, so... Anyway, I just thought you wanted to know. By the way, welcome to "Beyond Life." As for what this place is for… honestly, I have no idea.

Deckbuilding and Puzzle?
I know this sounds kind of weird, but hey, you're already here so you may as well try it. The idea is that your Tarot cards are powerful puzzle pieces that you can use to combat foes. You can build endless combinations with their own sets of mechanics and personalities. But there's a catch: you will need to adapt because the cards you find are pretty unpredictable. Which, now that I think about it, is kind of ironic given the whole "Tarot" thing.

About Beyond Life
To be honest, I think this whole place is a test, some kind of "purgatory." Reincarnation? Oh yeah, I've heard that too. But there are all sorts of wild theories floating around. Some say we’ll be reborn based on how we lived before, part of some endless cycle. Others are convinced this is Valhalla, where we wait for Ragnarok, the final battle. Some think we’re here to be judged, either sent to paradise or punishment. Then there are those who say the way you died determines your fate, and depending on it you need to climb the levels of the underworld. This would be a problem for me, I don't even remeber how I died!
How about you? Maybe you should explore a bit before jumping to any conclusions.

Coming soon!
The game is still in development, but is all steam ahead so it can be launched as soon as possible! I document everything on YouTube and take feedback and ideas on my Discord. So, don’t be shy—hop in and join the journey!

name: Umbra Lumen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Roguelike Deckbuilder meets puzzle gameplay. Collect tarot cards and mystic items as you face unpredictable events, meet memorable characters, and explore the beyond life. Each run is different, and every decision matters. Will you ascend or fall in this unique turn-based RPG?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
